member.name: IRadialControllerInterop.CreateForWindow
member.summary: Instantiates a RadialController object and binds it to the active application.
member.param: Handle to the window of the active application.

param.name: riid
param.para: The GUID for the resource interface.
The REFIID, or GUID, of the interface to the resource can be obtained by using the __uuidof() macro. For example, __uuidof(IRadialController) will get the GUID of the interface to a buffer resource.

member.param: Address of a pointer to a RadialController object.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IRadialControllerInterop
member.summary: Enables interoperability with a WinRT RadialController object and provides access to RadialController members for customizing the interaction experience.
